title: ConfCons.xml empty  if system crashes when mRemoteNG is open
author: ajaynair
body_snippet:
## Expected Behavior
The confCons.xml file should not be empty after a crash

## Current Behavior
confCons.xml is empty after a system crash

## Possible Solution
A workaround is to replace confCons.xml (which is empty) with conCons.xml.*.backup file. Choose the  conCons.xml.*.backup such that:
  It is the latest among all the options you have
  It is not empty
File location in my machine: C:\Users\<username>\AppData\Roaming\mRemoteNG\

## Steps to Reproduce (for bugs)

1. Open mRe...
